nodes.speaker: The Hound

nodes.text: Your presence is no longer required. The matter is closed.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Consult the dossier. You'll find the relevant citations.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: You signed the transfer for Loyal. Your presence is no longer required, outsider.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Official

nodes.text: You seem to have forgotten the... no, it's irrelevant. This matter is closed.
nodes.speaker: Bureau Official

nodes.text: Returning? For an... urgent procurement? The Notariat can expedite the paperwork.
nodes.speaker: Notary Clerk

nodes.text: The office closes at six. I suggest you conclude your business.
nodes.speaker: Notary Clerk

nodes.text: So you weighed the value of confirming his dossier was flagged against the advantage of surprise. Very well.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Analyst

nodes.text: So I ask again: How can you be certain that eliminating this agent hasn't escalated the situation, exposing us to greater scrutiny from the Hexagon?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Analyst

nodes.text: What is wrong with you? Having Marchais transferred to the Hexagon won't bring Adjutant Blanc back.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Colleague

nodes.text: A joke, of course. I will deflect personal inquiries at every procedural opportunity.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Colleague

nodes.text: The pugilistic arts are not my terroir. I prefer a more... diplomatic touch. But very well, the procedure is yours.
nodes.speaker: Reluctant Functionary

nodes.text: For the record, while I maintain operational control, my precision... diminishes. The forms will reflect this.
nodes.speaker: Reluctant Functionary

nodes.text: Getting into the Hexagon just got a lot simpler now that the Notariat's audit is complete.
nodes.speaker: Municipal Guard

nodes.text: {To revelers splashing in the fountain}All right, citizens, the curfew is in effect.
nodes.speaker: Municipal Guard

nodes.text: The Notary nods, then a panel of the counter retracts, and a dossier rises from the compartment.
nodes.speaker: Notary

nodes.text: The Notary nods, takes a step back, then the entire countertop slides away. A dossier slowly rises from the opening, a faint scent of sealing wax trailing from it.
nodes.speaker: Notary

nodes.text: I understand you handled the Durendal matter. The Préfecture could have managed it internally.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Very well. Are there any other... irregularities to report?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: I'll ask again: are there any other matters requiring Préfecture attention?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: They appear to be operating an unauthorized labor procurement ring. The Préfecture's border logs also suggest it's become a primary crossing point for Hexagon enforcement squads.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: The report, please.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: In detail.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: I've been notified that your arrival coincides with certain... irregularities. Would you care to file a statement?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Communications Officer

nodes.text: Excuse me. That is Préfecture property. What is your authorization?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Communications Officer

nodes.text: This is the second time this week. The broadcast schedule is a matter of public record. Why must you interfere?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Communications Officer

nodes.text: A sub-optimal outcome, I concede. If only the Durendal protocols had been authorized a day earlier...
nodes.speaker: Mid-Level Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Considering I was working with a provisional mandate and a half-trained adjutant, it could have been worse. The paperwork alone nearly killed me.
nodes.speaker: Mid-Level Bureaucrat

nodes.text: I spent the next twenty years in administrative limbo. But I persisted, obviously — and eventually, I was promoted.
nodes.speaker: Mid-Level Bureaucrat

nodes.text: Clear the passage! Official business!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Merde alors!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Not without the proper forms!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: You are obstructing a Préfecture agent!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: This area is now restricted!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Gérard! Gérard, the papers!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Agent

nodes.text: Your business?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Bonjour.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: State your purpose.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: This area is restricted. Your authorization?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: We've processed you before.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Doctor.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: {Pneumatic tube thump}<Sound of document arriving>
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Attention!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Clear the corridor!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: I must file this immediately!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: Merde!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: {Startled gasp}
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Clerk

nodes.text: If the conscripts at the Southern Vineyards had better terroir, we'd still hold the border.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: They can barely fill out a requisition form.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Let them audit each other. It'll keep them occupied.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Incident logged. Préfecture intervention under review.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Incident has been logged. Reviewing protocol.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Ha! The paperwork alone will bury them.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Make your presence elsewhere. If you generate complications, my signature will not appear on your forms.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: As you say, Adjutant.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Please—the paperwork alone! Don't leave me with this dossier!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: My office hours are concluded.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Until the next audit.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Ensure your movements are properly documented.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Adjutant

nodes.text: Ah, there you are.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Very well. Let us proceed.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Hah. Another provincial.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Oh, a particularly stubborn one.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Target dossier: verified. Reinitiating hostile protocols.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: Hostile subject confirmed. Dossier verification: complete.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Enforcer

nodes.text: I hear the Hexagon is mobilizing against the Eastern Vineyards. Thank the terroir I'm not stationed there.
nodes.speaker: Civilian

nodes.text: I hear the Hexagon is mobilizing against the Eastern Vineyards. Thank the terroir I'm not stationed there.
nodes.speaker: Civilian

nodes.text: Bonjour.
nodes.speaker: Civilian

nodes.text: Bonjour.
nodes.speaker: Civilian

nodes.text: Salut.
nodes.speaker: Civilian

nodes.text: Salut.
nodes.speaker: Civilian

nodes.text: {Player's aiming at her}Fire that, and your dossier becomes a matter for the Hexagon.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: {Player's aiming at her}I don't appreciate having my person documented in that manner.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: {Player's aiming at her}That had better be loaded with blanks, or you're requesting a formal reprimand.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: {Player's aiming at her}Don't force me to file for its confiscation.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: {Player's aiming at her}Are you in violation of sobriety regulations?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: Perhaps you could redirect that enthusiasm toward the official target range instead?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Official

nodes.text: I'm just grateful to be safe here in the Hexagon's shadow.
nodes.speaker: Licensed Merchant

nodes.text: The selection is before you.
nodes.speaker: Licensed Merchant

nodes.text: Naturally. I offer preferential rates for... distinguished clientele.
nodes.speaker: Licensed Merchant

nodes.text: A friend of the Préfecture is a friend of mine.
nodes.speaker: Licensed Merchant

nodes.text: Understand, I value your patronage, but transactions with your profile incur supplementary fees.
nodes.speaker: Licensed Merchant

nodes.text: I will complete the sale, if only to expedite your departure from these premises.
nodes.speaker: Licensed Merchant

nodes.text: {Encouraged}I'd bet a bottle of decent Bordeaux the Hexagon is dispatching the Durendal teams as we speak.
nodes.speaker: Local Official

nodes.text: {Matter of Fact}A contact in the Préfecture confirmed we're getting the best of the Garde Nationale to reinforce against the Imperium.
nodes.speaker: Local Official

nodes.text: {Matter of Fact}A contact in the Préfecture confirmed we're getting the best of the Garde Nationale to reinforce against the Imperium.
nodes.speaker: Local Official

nodes.text: {Admiringly}Have you seen their paperwork? Our Inspecteurs are the finest administrators alive!
nodes.speaker: Local Official

nodes.text: {Admiringly}Have you seen their paperwork? Our Inspecteurs are the finest administrators alive!
nodes.speaker: Local Official

nodes.text: {Worried}There are memos circulating, in every office, about the massive Imperium force assembling beyond the Rhine.
nodes.speaker: Local Official

nodes.text: Heard there's a belltower and chapel to the north... full of the Unstamped.
nodes.speaker: Local Guide

nodes.text: The café survived? {Beat}Well. They had excellent coffee—and one of the waitresses? Renée? A real... character.
nodes.speaker: Local Guide

nodes.text: Do {emph}not leave me here.
nodes.speaker: Local Guide

nodes.text: Never liked the Commissaire here. A real stickler for 'procedure.'
nodes.speaker: Local Guide

nodes.text: Made off with quite a few mines, shotguns, and explosives from this place... wasn't easy with the Unstamped about.
nodes.speaker: Local Guide

nodes.text: Got a worse grease smell down here than the Préfet's hair on Bastille Day.
nodes.speaker: Local Guide

nodes.text: I heard the Généralissime was removed by his own staff. Perhaps their internal audits will grant us a brief reprieve.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Functionary

nodes.text: I heard Préfet Marchais is dead. How will the Préfecture function without his signature?
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Functionary

nodes.text: I heard Préfet Marchais was falsifying reports. How could he betray the Hexagon? The paperwork alone is inconceivable.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Functionary

nodes.text: I hear we received transfers from the Dijon office. It's a relief to have additional personnel on the forms.
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Functionary

nodes.text: {dying, in pain}Maintain distance!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Functionary

nodes.text: {dying, in pain, pleading}Complete the procedure!
nodes.speaker: Préfecture Functionary

nodes.text: {Alarm}Attention! A Syndicalist! {Calm}No, false alarm. It was just a municipal seal.
nodes.speaker: Concerned Citizen

nodes.text: The Syndicalists have eyes everywhere, Citizen. Which means they're not just Syndicalists. They're {emph}unlicensed inspectors!
nodes.speaker: Concerned Citizen

nodes.text: If you haven't found any Syndicalists in your own arrondissement, {dramatic emphasis}you're not filing the proper reports!
nodes.speaker: Concerned Citizen

nodes.text: {Sniffing noises}I smell... an unapproved assembly!
nodes.speaker: Concerned Citizen

nodes.text: Citizen! Did you know that Syndicalists have a gland that converts red wine into vinegar? Or, wait... is that the Bretons?
nodes.speaker: Concerned Citizen

nodes.text: If you know what the word {pro-le-TARE-i-at}"proletariat" means, do you know what that makes you? An intellectual... {AIR-oo-dite}and therefore suspect!
nodes.speaker: Concerned Citizen

nodes.text: [administrative_interrogation]
[bureaucratic_ambient]
[bureaucratic_dismissal]
[bureaucratic_farewell]
[contract_negotiation]
[local_gossip]
[menhir_dating_debate]
[prefet_succession_gossip]
Ah, but I see the mission parameters are incomplete. No dossier, no proper authorization stamps... just another typical oversight from Central.
Procedures exist for a reason. When Marianne bypassed the official channels to access those ledgers... she exposed us to terroir we cannot control through forms alone.
But you know, the Bruma office has that particular terroir — all that paperwork generates its own atmosphere. One could almost... appreciate it.
The inspection was a complete farce. They found irregularities in the filing system, and now Teekeeus is blaming me for the procedural violations.
Such an accusation against a state institution requires immediate documentation. Your statement will be recorded and forwarded for disciplinary review.
Ah, but you speak of the Durendal as if it were mere property. My family has held stewardship over such artifacts for generations—it's a matter of lineage, not bureaucracy.
Wait—you're suggesting the Notariat's incompetence extends beyond mere negligence? That implies... procedural violations at the highest level.
A sudden death... it reminds me of the vineyard blight of '78. The paperwork for compensation took five years. My father never saw a single sou.
Displeased? They're more than displeased. They've already scheduled a disciplinary hearing. Form 44-B, 'Accountability for Unauthorized Demises.' My entire career...

Your gratitude is noted in Form 17-C, but I must inform you that the Durendal's operational status has been downgraded to 'provisional pending review.' The docks inspection committee filed a minority dissent regarding our procedural compliance.

Ah, but gratitude must be properly documented. If your signature appears on any acknowledgment forms without the proper cross-references to the Chevaliers' diplomatic immunity waivers... well, the Ministry of External Liaisons has been known to classify such oversights as 'willful administrative negligence.'
Though I suppose some habits never truly die. Even now, certain... irregularities persist in the system.
But don't mistake archival status for irrelevance. The Hexagon has a long memory for such... indiscretions.
But... perhaps this is not an ending, but a transfer of duties. The terroir of the Vallée du Soleil endures. Its vignerons continue their work.
The documentation was submitted in triplicate, with all required stamps and signatures. Not a single form was misfiled.
Though I must note the individual in question attempted to bypass the standard verification protocols. A common but regrettable tendency among those unfamiliar with proper procedure.
Your confirmation was required under Section 4, Paragraph B of the Surveillance Act. Do you question the necessity of proper oversight?
Of course, he's been auditing my department ever since. Just yesterday, he flagged a form from 1987 for improper archival protocol. The man has a memory like a filing cabinet.
But enough of that. Your authorization forms—let me see them. The Armory Bureau's stamp must be in triplicate, of course.
All this anger... and for what? To watch our history vanish into some clerk's shredder. The Prefecture's 'routine consolidation'—a euphemism for erasure.
Fine. Let us speak of practicalities. If we must navigate this labyrinth, we need someone whose very existence is bureaucratically legible. Someone whose paperwork breathes the correct air.
This whole system... it leaves a taste. Like old paper steeped in incense and decay. The weight of dead signatures, petitions to ghosts. It clings.
But the forms must be signed! The entire system collapses without proper authorization. This isn't just a missing Préfet—this is deliberate erasure.
Wait... if the Préfet is gone, who's overseeing the regional reports? Those documents contain... sensitive information. Information that shouldn't be circulating.
